translation: The Blessed Lord said, "It is desire and it is anger, both of the quality of Rajas, all-devouring and all-sinful; know this as the foe here in this world."
commentary: 3.37 desire: desire? This is this? Anger: anger? This is this? born of the Rajoguna? Mahashan: alldevouring? Mahapapma allsinful? Viddhi know? Anam this? Ih here? Vairinam the foe.Commentary Bhagavan Bhaga means the six attributes? viz.? Jnana (knowledge)? Vairagya (dispassion)? Kirti (fame)? Aishvarya (divine manifestations and excellences)? Sri (wealth)? and Read (might). He who possesses these
